messages.subject: NMB Sale Page Update
messages.msgSnippet: All, I have added six excellent tsuba, all NBTHK papered to the sales page on behalf a collector in Japan, take a look. Amongst them is a wonderful guard by
messages.messageBody:
All, I have added six excellent tsuba, all NBTHK papered to the sales
page on behalf a collector in Japan, take a look. Amongst them is a
wonderful guard by Nobuiye Akasaka.

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/sale/nihonto_sales_page.htm

Also I have updated the Kodogu Boxes section after several sales, and
adjusted the numbers accordingly. If you are interested in those, take a
look also.

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/sale/Kodogu_Boxes/Kodogu_Boxes.html

Thanks for the band width.

Rich Turner

--
Richard Turner
Nihontô Message Board <http://members5.boardhost.com/Nihon-To/>

/- for the discussion and sharing of all things Nihontô/



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
